Title: Chapter 8
Writer: Ryan Murphy (created by), Brad Falchuk (created by), Todd Kubrak, Crystal Liu (executive story editor), Todd Kubrak (story editor), Joshua Green (staff writer)
Actors: Kathy Bates, Sarah Paulson, Cuba Gooding Jr., Lily Rabe
Plot: Audrey, Monet, and Lee remain hostages of the Polks, while Shelby and Dominic try to think of a way to escape the wrath of The Butcher back at the house.
